entry.title: Friday night: A few clouds. Temperature rising to minus 22 by morning.
entry.summary: Clear. Increasing cloudiness overnight. Wind up to 15 km/h. Temperature rising to minus 22 by morning. Wind chill minus 37 this evening and minus 32 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EST Friday 30 December 2022

entry.title: Saturday: A mix of sun and cloud. Temperature falling to minus 24 in the afternoon.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Wind becoming northwest 20 km/h in the morning. Temperature falling to minus 24 in the afternoon. Wind chill minus 32 in the morning and minus 37 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EST Friday 30 December 2022
